revision.text:
'''Hoenn''' is the third [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 138 Pokémon from Treecko to Deoxys. Uniquely to this region, Deoxys can only be obtained after completing a unique questline and beating level 100 in the [[Battle Frontier]]. [[File:Hoenn Town Map.png|thumb|A Town Map of the Hoenn region]] ===Towns and [[Shops]]=== {| class="wikitable" |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Littleroot Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Oldale Town]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Mauville City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Verdanturf City]] |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Lavaridge Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Fallarbor Town]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Rustboro City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Petalberg City]] |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Dewford Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Slateport Town]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Fortree City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Lilycove City]] |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Mossdeep Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Sootopolis Town]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Ever Grande City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Pacifidlog Town]] |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Battle Frontier]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Hoenn_Cities_.26_Towns|Pokémon League Hoenn]] |} ===Routes=== ''See [[Route Statistics]] for more in-depth info.'' {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !
